document_data.name: Worden Ironfist
document_data.refs2e: Worden Ironfist's card gives his class as "Warrior", which is a generic class group encompassing [[Fighter]]s, [[Paladin]]s, and [[Ranger]]s. Since dwarves cannot be Paladins or Rangers (according to the [[Player's Handbook 2nd edition (revised)|revised ''Player's Handbook 2nd edition'']], pp. 38, 40), Worden must be a Fighter.
document_data.Description: Worden was a muscular dwarf, with tan skin and a brown beard with no mustache.
document_data.Personality: He was highly regarded by his clan, who revered him as a hero.
document_data.Possessions: Worden wore a great helm and a magical suit of ''[[Plate mail|field plate armor]]''. He owned a ''[[horn of Valhalla]]'', a ''hammer +3 [[dwarven thrower]]'', and a ''[[ring of earth elemental command]]''.
document_data.Relationships: He was a cousin of [[Tibold Hillmover]].{{Cite card/AD&D Trading Cards/1991|610|Tibold Hillmover}}
document_data.Activites: Worden was the leader of an adventuring band consisting of [[Udall Granitecrusher]], [[Vasos Flameslayer]], and his cousin Tibold. On one mission, the band sought to eliminate a tribe of [[giant]]s who encroached on their lands.
